page.title: 03VILLAGE HALL IN L.STAUGHTON
page.content: {The Village Hall}was completed in 1984.The cost was 70,000 pounds and this was raised by villagers having dances, auctions,coffee mornings sponsored walks and lotteries.It took 2o men to build it, bricklayers,carpenters and electricians, The ground originally belonged to the church and was rented by the school as a playing field then bought by the Village Hall Committee.The bricks came from old barns and cattle sheds in the village but some were new.The Hall is used for a variety of activities:- Brownies, Guides,Play School (children under 5 years), Toddler Group, Womens Institute,dances, whist drives,church fetes,badminton,plays and concerts.
